All Classes

Class Summary 
Class Description
AirEnemy
Creates a new enemy subclass extending the superclass EnemyBodies (a Walker body)
AirEnemyCollision
Create a new listener interface to enable the AirEnemy creatures to bounce between boundary walls and platforms in the world.
Character
Create a new Character representing the body the player will have control over, extending a Walker type to remain upright throughout the game.
characterCollision
Creates a new listener interface to enable the Character body to interact with specific bodies differently, from losing lives when colliding with enemies to destroying bodies that provide the player with an advantage.
characterMovement
Create a new KeyAdapter interface that provides the player with the operation to control the character body in the game.
CloudPlatform
Create a cloud platform in Level3 extending the attributes of the superclass Platform
Enemy
Initialise a superclass for all enemy bodies set as a Walker to remain upright
Fireball
Create a new Fireball extending DynamicBody
fireballCollide
Create a new listener interface to enable the fireballs to roll of rock platforms when spawned, and setting a new position every time it collides with the StaticBodies that are an instance of the 'Platform' class.
Game
Class operating the main functionality of the game in the user's view enabling features such as menu controls, animation/sound transitions between levels, transferring of player attributes and game level generation.
GameLevel
Superclass for all levels extending the World that enables motion and interactions to be simulated in the game.
GameLoader
Demonstration of the game state data saved can be read from a text file and reproduced in the view when loaded back
GameSaver
Demonstration of the game state data can be saved to a text file whilst playing the game
GameView
Creates a view interface to display the game to the user including attributes displays to keep track
GameWorld  
Heart
Create a new body for the player to increase the number of lives they have in the game
HighScore
This will create a new JFrame to display the high scores that will display a list of strings when the scores button is pressed
HighScoreReader
Demonstrates how high-score data can be read from a text file and printed to the terminal.
HighScoreWriter
Demonstrates how high-score data can be written to a text file.
IceDemon
Create a new enemy subclass extending the superclass EnemyBodies (a Walker Body)
iceDemonCollide
Create a new listener interface to allow the IceDemon creatures to move between the set boundaries in the world.
IcePlatform
Create an ice platform in Level2 extending the attributes of the superclass Platform
Key
Create a new body for the player to collect in the game in order to progress through the different levels
LavaPlatform
Create a lava platform in Level1 extending the attributes of the superclass Platform
Level1
Level 1 of the game extending GameLevel
Level2
Level 2 of the game extending GameLevel
Level3
Level 3 of the game extending GameLevel
Level4
Level 4 of the game extending GameLevel
MenuPanel
Demonstration of how a new menu panel GUI will be displayed in the view that provide the user with additional controls over the functionality of the game
Platform
Create a new superclass for the platforms that will be generated in the game view of each level
PolygonEditor  
Portal
Create a new portal body in the level for the player to transition between each level that remains static in the game view
PortalListener
Application of a portal collision listener that will register the collision between the main player and the portal body
PowerUp
Create a new body for the player to collect in the game in order to destroy enemy bodies that exist in the level.
Reaper
Create a new enemy subclass extending the superclass EnemyBodies (a Walker Body)
reaperCollision
Create a new listener interface to allow the Reaper to move between set boundaries/platforms.
RockPlatform
Create a rock platform in Level4 extending the attributes of the superclass Platform
StonePlatform
Create a stone platform in Level1 extending the attributes of the superclass Platform
Track
This class is used to listen to steps taken in the program and will be used to track the specific bodies in the game i.e.
